attributes.action: Forced retirements of Police officers due to budget cuts must stop
attributes.additional_details:
As a former police officer who was forced to retire because of the Goverment's cuts I would like Parliament to debate the effect the Goverment's comprehensive spending review has had on frontline policing across the country Including how many officers have been forced to retire.
20% cuts go too far and with 16,000 officers expected to be cut, the public should hear from the goverment as to why they are choosing to cut the police service.
